00048 ObjectiveFunction::~ObjectiveFunction() {}

00055 double ObjectiveFunction::get_eps( PatchData &pd, 
00056                                    EvalType type,
00057                                    double &local_val,
00058                                    int dim,
00059                                    size_t vertex_index, 
00060                                    MsqError& err)
00061 {
00062   double eps = 1.e-07;
00063   const double rho = 0.5;
00064   const int imax = 20;
00065   bool feasible = false;
00066   double tmp_var = 0.0;
00067   Vector3D delta(0,0,0);
00068   for (int i = 0; i < imax; ++i)
00069   {
00070     //perturb kth coord val and check feas if needed
00071     tmp_var = pd.vertex_by_index(vertex_index)[dim];
00072     delta[dim] = eps;
00073     pd.move_vertex( delta, vertex_index, err );
00074     feasible = evaluate( type, pd, local_val, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00075     //revert kth coord val
00076     delta = pd.vertex_by_index(vertex_index);
00077     delta[dim] = tmp_var;
00078     pd.set_vertex_coordinates( delta, vertex_index, err );
00079     //if step was too big, shorten it and go again
00080     if (feasible)
00081       return eps;
00082     else
00083       eps *= rho;
00084   }//end while looking for feasible eps
00085   return 0.0;
00086 }//end function get_eps
00087 
00088 bool ObjectiveFunction::compute_subpatch_numerical_gradient(
00089                                  EvalType type,
00090                                  EvalType subtype,
00091                                  PatchData& pd,
00092                                  double& flocal,
00093                                  Vector3D& grad,
00094                                  MsqError& err )
00095 {
00096   assert( pd.num_free_vertices() == 1 );
00097   
00098   double flocald=0;
00099   double eps=0;
00100   
00101   bool b = evaluate( type, pd, flocal, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );
00102   if(MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !b) {
00103     return false;
00104   }
00105 
00106     //loop over the three coords x,y,z
00107   for(int j=0; j<3; ++j) {
00108     eps = get_eps( pd, subtype, flocald, j, 0, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00109     if (eps==0) {
00110       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Dividing by zero in Objective Functions numerical grad",
00111                       MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00112       return false;
00113     }
00114     grad[j]=(flocald-flocal)/eps;
00115   }
00116   return true;
00117 }
00118 
00119 bool ObjectiveFunction::compute_patch_numerical_gradient(  EvalType type,
00120                                                            EvalType subtype,
00121                                                            PatchData& pd,
00122                                                            double& flocal,
00123                                                            std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00124                                                            MsqError& err )
00125 {
00126   double flocald=0;
00127   double eps=0;
00128   
00129   bool b = evaluate( type, pd, flocal, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );
00130   if(MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !b) {
00131     return false;
00132   }
00133 
00134   for (size_t i = 0; i < pd.num_free_vertices(); ++i) {
00135       //loop over the three coords x,y,z
00136     for(int j=0; j<3; ++j) {
00137       eps = get_eps( pd, subtype, flocald, j, i, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00138       if (eps==0) {
00139         MSQ_SETERR(err)("Dividing by zero in Objective Functions numerical grad",
00140                         MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00141         return false;
00142       }
00143       grad[i][j]=(flocald-flocal)/eps;
00144     }
00145   }
00146   
00147   return true;
00148 }

00172 bool ObjectiveFunction::evaluate_with_gradient( EvalType eval_type,
00173                                                 PatchData &pd,
00174                                                 double& OF_val,
00175                                                 std::vector<Vector3D>& grad,
00176                                                 MsqError &err )
00177 {
00178   bool b;
00179   grad.resize( pd.num_free_vertices() );
00180   
00181     // Fast path for single-free-vertex patch
00182   if (pd.num_free_vertices() == 1) {
00183     const EvalType sub_type = (eval_type == CALCULATE) ? CALCULATE : TEMPORARY;
00184     b = compute_subpatch_numerical_gradient( eval_type, sub_type, pd, OF_val, grad[0], err );
00185     return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && b;
00186   }
00187   
00188   ObjectiveFunction* of = this;
00189   std::auto_ptr<ObjectiveFunction> deleter;
00190   if (eval_type == CALCULATE) {
00191     of->clear();
00192     b = of->evaluate( ACCUMULATE, pd, OF_val, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );
00193     if (err) { // OF doesn't support BCD type evals, try slow method
00194       err.clear();
00195       of->clear();
00196       b = compute_patch_numerical_gradient( CALCULATE, CALCULATE, pd, OF_val, grad, err );
00197       return !MSQ_CHKERR(err) && b;
00198     }
00199     else if (!b)
00200       return b;
00201   } 
00202   else {
00203     b = this->evaluate( eval_type, pd, OF_val, OF_FREE_EVALS_ONLY, err );
00204     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !b)
00205       return false;
00206     of = this->clone();
00207     deleter = std::auto_ptr<ObjectiveFunction>(of);
00208   }
00209 
00210     // Determine number of layers of adjacent elements based on metric type.
00211   unsigned layers = min_patch_layers();
00212   
00213     // Create a subpatch for each free vertex and use it to evaluate the
00214     // gradient for that vertex.
00215   double flocal;
00216   PatchData subpatch;
00217   for (size_t i = 0; i < pd.num_free_vertices(); ++i)
00218   {
00219     pd.get_subpatch( i, layers, subpatch, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00220     b = of->compute_subpatch_numerical_gradient( SAVE, TEMPORARY, subpatch, flocal, grad[i], err );
00221     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !b) {
00222       of->clear();
00223       return false;
00224     }
00225   }
00226   
00227   of->clear();
00228   return true;
00229 }
00230 
00231 bool ObjectiveFunction::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( EvalType type, 
00232                                         PatchData& pd,
00233                                         double& value_out,
00234                                         std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00235                                         std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& hess_diag_out,
00236                                         MsqError& err )
00237 {
00238   MsqHessian hess;
00239   hess.initialize( pd, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00240   bool val = evaluate_with_Hessian( type, pd, value_out, grad_out, hess, err );
00241   MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00242   hess_diag_out.resize( hess.size() );
00243   for (size_t i = 0; i < hess.size(); ++i)
00244     hess_diag_out[i] = hess.get_block(i,i)->upper();
00245   return val;
00246 }
00247 
00248 bool ObjectiveFunction::evaluate_with_Hessian( EvalType type, 
00249                                                PatchData& pd,
00250                                                double& value_out,
00251                                                std::vector<Vector3D>& grad_out,
00252                                                MsqHessian& Hessian_out,
00253                                                MsqError& err ) 
00254 {
00255       MSQ_SETERR(err)("No Hessian available for this objective function.\n"
00256                       "Choose either a different objective function or a "
00257                       "different solver.\n",
00258                     MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00259       return false;
00260 }
